title: Update Patient Insurance Information
description: A patient informs the front desk that their insurance has changed.

tasks.description: Locate the patient's record and navigate to the insurance section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the patient's current insurance information.

tasks.description: Inactivate the old insurance policy and add the new insurance carrier, plan, and member ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters the new policy information.

tasks.description: Set the new policy as the primary insurance for future billing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the patient's coverage information.
